word: IT IS A FACT THAT DURING MY THIRTY OR MORE YEARS OF ASSOCIATION WITH ELLEN WHITE I HAD THE UTMOST CONFIDENCE IN HER MINISTRY. I KNOW THAT SHE RECEIVED REVELATIONS FROM GOD WHICH WERE OF UNTOLD VALUE TO THE CHURCH AND TO THE WORLD. I DID NOT ENTER AS FULLY AS SOME OF OUR BRETHREN WISH TO DO IN AN ANALYSIS OF THE SOURCES OF INFORMATION WHICH ENABLED HER TO WRITE HER BOOKS.
